name: Space Time Attack #GodotWildJam34
description:
My first attempt at 3d :D
The game was made for #GodotWildJam 34 with the theme of  SPACE
The web version should work fine (generation may be slow), there are standalone executables to download :)

The controls are or the screen, the steering is so weird to make it harder ;)

All levels have a seed so you can compete with your friends for the best time!!
For example here is my best time for the seed gwj34

There is a lot of stuff missing, for example no pause menu, and you can only reset by exiting the game (alt+f4) or finishing the race :(

I'm planning to fix it up and add more features like boosts and a leaderboard!
Hope you like it :)

Tools used:
Godot Engine 3.3.2
Krita
Pixelorama
KenShape
Chiptone
Skyboxes generated here
